issue.title: segfault when calling ipopt virtual method

content.raw:
> The symbol conflict issue is fixed in Simbody 3.6, which has been released.

Indeed. The patched `.deb` packages are useful as drop-in replacements for using Gazebo package for Ubuntu 18.04 without recompiling it, as in Ubuntu 18.04 the Simbody version used  is the 3.5 .
content.html:
The symbol conflict issue is fixed in Simbody 3.6, which has been released.

Indeed. The patched .deb packages are useful as drop-in replacements for using Gazebo package for Ubuntu 18.04 without recompiling it, as in Ubuntu 18.04 the Simbody version used is the 3.5 .
